verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Draw near O Lord Our God, Graciously hear us,
Guilty of sinning before you.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: 1.O king exalted saviour of all nations see how ourgrieving lift our eyes to heaven Hear us redeemer as we beg forgiveness.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
2.Mighty of the Father, keystone of God's temple.
Way of salvation gate to heavens glory sin has enslaved us, free your sons from bondage.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
3.We pray you O God throned in strength and splendour
hear from your kingdom This our song of sorrow show us mercy pardon our offences.
